articles.title: Philippines hikes rates by half point to tame 'rampant' inflation - Nikkei Asia

articles.content:
MANILA -- The Philippine central bank on Thursday raised its key interest rate by half a percentage point in a bid to tame stubbornly high inflation.

articles.title: Stephen 'tWitch' Boss, Ellen show's dancing DJ, dies at 40 - Channel NewsAsia
articles.description: His wife, Allison Holker Boss, confirmed his passing in a statement published on Wednesday (Dec 14) on People.com. The Los Angeles coroner said Boss' cause of death was suicide.
